mapper.insert: insert into db_customer (CUSTOMERID, CUSTOMERNAME, 'PASSWORD', CUSTOMERSEX, CUSTOMERAGE, CUSTOMERBIRTHDAY, CUSTOMERFIRSTNAME, CUSTOMERLASTNAME, CUSTOMERTYPE, CUSTOMERTEL1, CUSTOMERTEL2, CUSTOMEREMAIL, CUSTOMERQQ, CUSTOMERMSN, CUSTOMERCOUNTRY, CUSTOMERPROVINCE, CUSTOMERCITY, CUSTOMERADDRESS, CUSTOMERZIPCODE, CUSTOMERFAX, CUSTOMERRESERVE1, CUSTOMERRESERVE2, CUSTOMERRESERVE3, CUSTOMERRESERVE4, CUSTOMERRESERVE5, CUSTOMERRESERVE6, CUSTOMERRESERVE7, CUSTOMERRESERVE8, CUSTOMERRESERVE9, CUSTOMERRESERVE10, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, ORDERCOUNT, ORDERNUM, ORDERMONEY, SLEVEL, ORDERRESERVE1, ORDERRESERVE2 ) values (#{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customersex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerbirthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerfirstname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerlastname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customertel1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customertel2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customeremail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerqq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customermsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customercountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customercity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customeraddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerzipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerfax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerreserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerreserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerreserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerreserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerreserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerreserve6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerreserve7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerreserve8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerreserve9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerreserve10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ordercount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ordermoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{slevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderreserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderreserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
